data.name: Stellar Propeller
data.detailed_description:
Overview: Stellar Propeller is a single-player plane racing game where players race through various levels and dodge obstacles to try and achieve a high score.

Design: Stylized, 3D Racing Game where players will race to beat their best times. Simple controls WASD, Mouse0, Mouse1

Localization: Minimal text elements but only available in English.
data.about_the_game:
Overview: Stellar Propeller is a single-player plane racing game where players race through various levels and dodge obstacles to try and achieve a high score.

Design: Stylized, 3D Racing Game where players will race to beat their best times. Simple controls WASD, Mouse0, Mouse1

Localization: Minimal text elements but only available in English.
data.short_description: Stellar Propeller is a fast-paced, single-player racing game with a variety of worlds, each with its own unique levels.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-9100F 4.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 460 / Radeon 6870 / Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600 3.3GHz / AMD FX 8350 4.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 4GB VRAM / AMD R9 280 3GB VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS Sierra - 10.12.6
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
